001package com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor;
002
003/** Class for color sensors
004 * @author Alex Stedman
005 */
006@SuppressWarnings("unused")
007public class ColorSensor extends Sensor<com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor> implements IColorSensor {
008
009    /** Make a color Sensor
010     *
011     * @param device The hardware device
012     */
013    public ColorSensor(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.ColorSensor device) {
014        super(device);
015    }
016
017    /** Make a color sensor
018     *
019     * @param deviceName The device name in hardware map
020     */
021    public ColorSensor(String deviceName) {
022        super(deviceName);
023    }
024
025    @Override
026    public int argb() {
027        return getDevice().argb();
028    }
029}
